comment.author: 67502625@N07
comment._content: It is the area of nurenburg, where before 1945 Hitler celebrated the "Reichsparteitage". Now every two years in September is the great landscape design exposition "Galabau Nürnberg". We take part in this exposition, see: www.dr-alex-rollrasen.de

comment.author: 33989759@N04
comment._content:
In Torgau near the river Elbe in 26 4. 1945 the American and Russian Troops linked first time at the end of World War II. We designed the memorial on the east side of the river, build up with donations of the american veterans of West Point 1995.
Have You historical pictures of this link? Greetings from Germany Harald Alex
my Email adress is:    harald.alex@gmail.com
ps: tree years ago we installated turfgras of our turf farm in the garden of the American Ambassador in Berlin

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/harald-alex] I am sorry but I don't think we have photos of the meeting at the Elbe.
